Instruction: Gradually add the flour and baking powder, mixing until just combined.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Prepare a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, until the edges are lightly golden. Let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Remove from the oven and, while still warm, take tuiles off the pan and place them over a rolling pin. Let them sit for a few minutes to harden and cool. Store in an airtight container.
